articles.title: As the mother of a daughter named Alexa, I welcome the BBC's new male virtual assistant 'Beeb' - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: AI-powered assistants with female voices have been found to perpetuate harmful gender biases, and for some the problems are personal
articles.content: Watch out, Alexa: theres a new voice assistant in town - and its catchy little name is Beeb. Yes, that is Beeb, as in the Beeb. Unwilling to be outdone by the Amazon behemoth, the BBC has brought us … [+2526 chars]
